name: OfficeHours
description:
High Concept

Manage the stress of deadlines in a casual teacher office setting.

Story

Grades are due in 5 minutes and you are behind on your work! Finish condemning student projects while remove distractions before time runs out.

Credits

Brian Chan - Lead Programmer

Christine Wright - Composer, Sound Design & 2D Concept Artist

Jordan Brown - Animator & 3D Artist

Marchand Venter - 3D & Texture Artist

Nathan Trimboli - Producer & Game Designer

Noah Hunter - Lord Regent 3D & Texture Artist
